title: Cody Miles: Global Time Attack Driver
description:
Cody Miles is a driver in the Global Time Attack series with a rare setup: a Subaru STI with air suspension. We sat down to talk about his career, his car, and a lot more. 

Watch Cody's car in action here: https://www.airliftperformance.com/blog/gta-super-lap-battle/

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/collections/the-smoking-tire

 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/K6II0TcBAAA

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @sidewaysandsmiling (Cody)
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
